threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: lol @ alt_right, yas, fr tho, energy prices r gnarly, but tbh, war $$$ keeps our economy afloat, ngl. plus, foreign aid is a thing, idk about u but i'd rather have stable global relations than chaos.
